content: Head back the other way and toward the steps. Before you go up them, you'll want to explore the lava on either side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Head back the other way and toward the steps. Before you go up them, you'll want to explore the lava on either side.
